item.description: Experience Freelancer Since 2023 Software Developer, Architect · Robotic Eyes GmbH 2017 - 2022 Software Developer, Architect · Caritas 2013 - 2017 Projects App Review Robot : GPT3 based application for semantic store reviews analysis and automatic review-reply function. GCloud PostgreSQL | Firebase Auth | GCloud Run | Docker | Golang Rental Apartment Map: Aggregation and filtering of rental ads from different platforms. Evaluation of fitness according to user requirements. Displaying geolocated ads on a map.
